spatial_accuracy.notes: Layout topology generally preserved but relative room sizes, especially the bathroom and corridor, are slightly off. Wall geometry has minor deviations in one area. All doors are present and correctly placed. Windows are missing from the left bedroom and the right-side wall of the main living area. Dimensional scaling is acceptable overall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Cutaway view is good. Completeness and hallucination control are strong. UI/Annotation cleanliness is breached by the 'Multi-Room Floor Plan Template' text. Background is not dark neutral, and the model has a very subtle ground plane/shadow.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture pieces are present, kitchen and bathroom fixtures are indicated. However, the scale and style of some furniture pieces differ significantly (e.g., dining table, bedside tables). The left bedroom has additional furniture (dresser) not in the 2D plan. The left-most wall shelf in the living area is missing.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render uses non-flat shaded surfaces, high-res meshes with textures and materials (e.g., wood grain, fabric on beds/sofas, tiled floor in bathroom/kitchen). This is a critical violation of geometry style. Lighting is somewhat soft and ambient but hints of more complex shading are visible. Camera composition is good, but the projection is arguably orthographic rather than true isometric.

detected_errors.description: Text labels present ('Multi-Room Floor Plan Template').
Photorealistic rendering/materials detected (wood grain, fabric textures, subtle reflections, patterned tiles, non-flat shading).
Missing wall shelf in living area.
Extra dresser in left bedroom not specified in 2D plan.
Missing two windows from the left bedroom and one from the main living area (right wall).

summary: The 3D render fails due to critical violations of the required rendering style (photorealism and text presence) and significant discrepancies in furniture mapping and missing windows, despite generally good spatial accuracy for walls and doors.
